name: Mega underground scene creator pack
description: This kit includes an absolute ton of assets for crafting awesome looking underground levels including a complete tile set, background layers for crafting infinitely long and infinitely deep levels. If you're looking for a quick and simple solution to adding the underground scene to your levels the pack also includes various premade backgrounds, so you don't have to build your scene layer by layer. As well as this you can add interest and comedy with some cool fossils skeletons and other underground items.
